books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Laurell K. Hamilton
books.description: The Mother of All Darkness stalks the vampire hunter Anita Blake, who is pursuing a serial killer in the Pacific Northwest.
books.name: HIT LIST

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents are killed in a car accident, a young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: In the Amazon basin, a medical researcher searches for her former mentor, a despotic scientist who is developing a miracle fertility drug.
books.name: STATE OF WONDER

books.author: by Clive Cussler with Grant Blackwood
books.description: Husband-and-wife treasure hunters travel to Asia in an adventure involving missing persons, black-market fossils and the ancient Tibetan kingdom of Mustang.
books.name: THE KINGDOM

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: The Minneapolis detective Lucas Davenport investigates the murders of two girls who were kidnapped in 1985.
books.name: BURIED PREY

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: Detective Lindsay Boxer and the Women’s Murder Club race to find a missing baby.
books.name: 10TH ANNIVERSARY

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: A maid of honor to her charmed friend, Rachel White has always played by the rules. But that changes on her 30th birthday.
books.name: SOMETHING BORROWED

books.author: by Barbara Freethy
books.description: Three sailboat-racing sisters close ranks against a tenacious reporter who digs into a devastating secret from their past.
books.name: SUMMER SECRETS

books.author: by Susanna Kearsley
books.description: A novelist writing about James Stuart’s claim to the throne wonders if she is being inspired by ancestral memory.
books.name: THE WINTER SEA

books.author: by Emma Donoghue
books.description: The entire world of the 5-year-old boy who narrates this novel is the 11-by-11-foot room in which his mother is being held prisoner.
books.name: ROOM

books.author: by Mary Kay Andrews
books.description: Three friends in their mid-30s spend a month on the Outer Banks of North Carolina.
books.name: SUMMER RENTAL

books.author: by Charlaine Harris
books.description: The telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse seeks the culprit in a firebombing.
books.name: DEAD RECKONING

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The lawyer for an alleged serial killer is murdered, and two former Secret Service agents are on the case.
books.name: THE SIXTH MAN
